definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="178" y="74"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">Reset</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Generation</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You are now a Third Generation</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:IgnitionAbilityTHIRDtype</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Your Ignition Ability is "Arrow"</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
